text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: There are words that I'll never forget. I'll never struggle to remember them, because these words will always remain in my heart.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: 『There's no way some country bumpkins can win』 『See? Look at that』 『That's right, there's no way we can win』

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: A racing class that was held out in the sticks. That was the first time I raced. There was an aura of resignation from those disparaging words.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: The overflowing indignation from their words just wouldn't disappear.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……That's why, I'll show all of them. Everyone that looked down on me, and those that gave up because they couldn't keep up……!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: For all those Uma Musume from the countryside, I'll become their Ace――For sure, I'll show all of them……!!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: That your strength has nothing to do with where you came from……!!

text_block_list.name: Tired-looking Trainer
text_block_list.text: Like I said, I'm not saying it's bad, but it's too big of a dream. That's just a kid's dream.

text_block_list.name: Tired-looking Trainer
text_block_list.text: As a newbie, just talking about a big dream like that won't earn you any trust.

text_block_list.name: Tired-looking Trainer
text_block_list.text: In the beginning, it's fine to just say something like 『I'll do my best for you』. It's less pressure, and easier for your partner to accept, right?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: That trainer is……the one from yesterday……

text_block_list.name: Tired-looking Trainer
text_block_list.text: Guiding your partner Uma Musume to the summit…… as a response to an interview question, it's perfect though.

text_block_list.name: Tired-looking Trainer
text_block_list.text: I'm saying this for your sake, you know. A huge dream like that, will end up being a heavy burden for you too……
I want to deny it. But……some of what he said can't be denied.
If there isn't a girl I'm training, then I can't really be called a trainer.
It's normal for an Uma Musume to be uneasy if I don't even have a track record. If it's talking about dreams, that's something anyone can do.

text_block_list.name: Tired-looking Trainer
text_block_list.text: Just have a more realistic dream. It's better than being told you're in over your head, right? Save the big dreams for after you've got more experience――
I clenched my fists tightly. I was shaken by these words, and it was frustrating that I had no response.
No matter how hard I tried as a trainer, if I was alone――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: But, it's your dream isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Right, Trainer-san?

text_block_list.name: Tired-looking Trainer
text_block_list.text: Ah. Y-you were listening just now……? Well, you could just say it was a conversation between adults……umm……I-I'll take my leave then!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Don't clench your fists so hard. You'll hurt yourself.
I didn't realize until she mentioned it. I relaxed my strength and looked at my palms. I could clearly see where my fingernails dug in.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: …………Sorry! I wasn't trying to eavesdrop or anything, I just happened to hear it.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: You probably didn't want me to hear it though…… But, I hope you can forgive me for hearing it.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Is that so? Then, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: It's fine, it's fine!
She kept pushing me forward, eventually taking me to the training course. There were――
The Uma Musume known as the "Emperor", Symboli Rudolf. And Mr. C.B. Several other famous Uma Musume as well……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: My dream is to become the Ace of the Uma Musume world!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: By beating everyone over there.
Katsuragi Ace declared that with a clear voice and a cheerful laugh.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Do you think it's reckless? That a huge dream like that is unreachable? Do you think that?
……There were many Uma Musume at Tracen Academy. They were all strong and outstanding Uma Musume.
But, it didn't matter how outstanding you were, there could only be a few winners. Not everyone could win.
――However.
choice_data_list: Our job is to fulfill those dreams
Our job is to fulfill those dreams

text_block_list.text: Reckless? Too big? So what? That's how dreams are supposed to be.
If it's something that can be fulfilled so easily, rather than a dream, you might as well call them 『Plans』.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Right, that's a trainer's job. And, you've got a dream too right?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Then there's no reason to back down!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Just aim for your dream. That there might be a few obstacles on that long road, that's to be expected.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Just break through and continue on! Someday you'll get there! If you're committed!
